name: Speed Door
description:
Your goal is to pass the game levels in the time that allows you a door at the end of the level. 

CONTROLS:
Right arrow: Go right
Left arrow: Go left
Space: Jump

For low timing due to the expiration of the JAM the "music" feature has some bugs that will be fixed in a later version of the game

For the high difficulty the game has been simplified ... in the full version many things will be changed. Follow the new updates.
